{{Infobox Berry |name = Pomeg |image = [[File:Pomeg.png]] |caption = When this sweetly spicy Berry's thick skin is peeled, many pieces of the fruit spill out. |growtime = 1h 30m 0s |harvest = 20 berries |replant = 20% |points = 500 |flavor =
*10 spicy *0 dry *10 sweet *10 bitter *0 sour }} '''Pomeg''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by surrounding an empty plot with at least 1 [[Iapapa]] and at least 1 [[Mago]]. {| class="wikitable" |+ Growth Stages !!! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- ! Time passed since planting | 3 mins 20 secs || 20 mins || 1 hour 6 mins 40 secs || 1 hour 30 mins - 3 hours |- ! Animation |
[[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] ||
[[File:PomegTreeTaller.png|50px]] ||
[[File:PomegTreeBloom.png|50px]] ||
[[File:PomegTreeBerry.png|50px]] |} === Possible Planting Formations === You can fill your [[farm]] in following way to obtain Pomeg berry. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Farm |- style="height: 50px;" | style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Iapapa.png|30px]] [[Iapapa]] || style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Iapapa.png|30px]] [[Iapapa]] || style="width: 40px;" | |- | || [[File:Mago.png|30px]] [[Mago]] || || || [[File:Mago.png|30px]] [[Mago]] |- style="height: 50px;" | || || || || |- | [[File:Iapapa.png|30px]] [[Iapapa]] || || || [[File:Iapapa.png|30px]] [[Iapapa]] || |- | || [[File:Mago.png|30px]] [[Mago]] || || || [[File:Mago.png|30px]] [[Mago]] |} {{Berries}}
